title: Ticket #940: Batch leases for cream jobs
description:
With cream, leases are their own entities. The client creates a lease on the server with a unique name and an expiration date. The client can then associate that lease with any number of subsequent jobs. Lease renewal is done to the lease entity. When the lease expires, all jobs associated with it are removed.

Currently, Condor creates a separate lease for each job. Most jobs could share the same lease. We have discovered that having a separate lease per job has huge performance issues when scaling up to thousands of jobs, on both the client and the server.
